name: Board Game Money
description:
Board Game Money lets you focus on the fun sides of game by handling all the money transactions for you. This app keeps track of the accounts of up to 6 players so you can enjoy the game without having to worry about counting money anymore.

• Add players by tapping the "+" button
• Transfer money by simply dragging between the players or the bank
• Quickly add $200 when a player passes "GO" by tapping on him
• Customize the currency, the quick add amount and the default balance in the settings
